column4: apparantly, there's a linux version of uTorrent being worked on.. Fingers crossed. =3
yeah but then there's the thing with it being bought by bittorrent inc (i.e. hollywoord) which doesn't sound to appealing :)
hrmf... I'm not so sure about that being a bad thing.. but I do believe the effect remains to be seen
sure, I don't know, it's just something that doesn't really rhyme with the concept of  downloading movies with closed source software owned by hollywood :)
